entry.title: This is not the robot you are looking for
entry.content:
Published on 2023-03-16 in Tote HaD.

Apparently there are some rumors that this is a robot we are going to be building at a workshop in Berlin during the 2023 Hackaday conference. That is not true.

This is the robot we were building back in 2016 in Belgrade.

Yes, there is going to be a robot-building robot in Berlin, but we are going to be building project-180025 , which is a newer design with many improvements.
